title: A Family for Baby Bear (The Baby Bear Series)
features: An award winning children's book by Kevin Fletcher-Velasco. Join Mama Polar Bear on her journey to find the perfect home and bear family to raise her unborn cub. Her icy home is missing the trees, fish, and caves she wants for her baby bear. She meets lots of different and wonderful bear families. But which bear family will she choose? Families come in all shapes and sizes and colors. Kevin Fletcher-Velasco states, "When my husband and I brought home our daughter over a year ago, we started looking for children's book on open-adoption that we could start reading from day one. Unfortunately, we didn't find anything out there that fit our situation, so I wrote one." Now "A Family for Baby Bear" is the first of a three book series called The Baby Bear Series. To find out more about this book and the author by visiting http://www.thebabybearseries.com
description: Join Mama Polar Bear on her journey to find the perfect home and bear family to raise her unborn cub.  Her icy home is missing the trees, fish, and caves she wants for her baby bear.  She meets lots of different and wonderful bear families. But which bear family will she choose?

Kevin Fletcher-Velasco and his husband, Tim, live with their wonderful daughter and their dog. Tim and Kevin spent almost three years waiting for their daughter to join their family through open adoption. Kevin decided to write down his daughter's story as a way to introduce the topic of open adoption. Through advice from friends, family, and loved ones, Kevin decided to modify his story for a larger population.  Kevin is excited to see his family's story shared with other families across the globe.
